values:
ok so i haven't written in here in for-ev-er!!  so much has happened!!  my life has changed so much and i'm absolutely loving it.  

ok so first, school's great, but all of their little rules are starting to get on my nerves!!  i cannot stand them!!  they are so stupid!  anywho, i think my classes are going smoothly.  i'm enjoying them.  

work(s) are fine.  i love both my jobs!!  i've gotten a promotion at chick-fil-a twice.  first i took victoria's place which is a HUGE deal!!  and now i'm moving up to be a Unit Training Coordinator (UTC).  i'm excited.  

boys...oh goodness where to start?

well jeff is still being jeff and not understanding that i'm not in love him anymore b/c he's changed so much.  i just don't understand him i guess.  he just doesn't seem like his in love with me, but then again he seems like he does love me.  it's just a huge confusing mess!!  i love him to death, i just don't think we're meant to be together like that, anymore.  

and i so have the biggest crush on kyle!!  he's awesome!!  he just reminds me of what i've always wanted in a guy.  he's smart, funny, adorable!!, and he is just so loving.  he just has the biggest heart of anyone i know.  i wish i knew if he would ever go for a gal like me.  but i guess i'm going to have to wait and see what happens between us in the next couple of months.  lots can still happen!!

ok well i know that's not a lot considering the time i've missed writing in my journal, but that's all i got...what can i say i'm boring i guess.  ok well i have some homework to do so i guess i'll write in here again later!!  bunches, megs

saw it and i couldn't help myself alisha!!...lol

LASTS~
last kiss: a week ago
last cigarette: never tried it
last good cry: two weeks ago...over the whole "no chapel credit" thing, it all just came out
last library book checked out:  yeah...my junior year of high school...i still have them checked out (oops!!)...lol!
last movie seen: Meet the Fockers (last wednesday) and Darkness (this coming sunday!!)
last book read: the flags of our fathers...for u.s. history
last cuss word uttered:  should i be keeping up with that...probably not!
last beverage drank: water
last food consumed: soup from chick-fil-a!
last phone call: jeff
last tv show watched: conan o'brian...hilarious
last shoes worn: new balances
last cd played: cake and kelly clarkson
last item bought: gas and lowe's gift card for the grands!
last downloaded: yeah i would download if the stupid thing would let me!
last annoyance: not getting my check today b/c it snowed somewhere
last disappointment: thinking i was going to have to work sunday...but i'm not so it's all better now
last soda drank: diet coke
last thing handwritten: my schedule for next week
last word spoken: "winston"
last sleep: woke up at 10:00
last im: katie bell...telling her about sunday night!
last weird encounter: some guy brought a bed, bath, & beyond coupon to bath & body works and thought he could use it!
last ice cream eaten: chick-fil-a cone...yumm!
last amused: kyle
trippin on drugs?: only when i have a splitting headache and take 3 of something
last time wanting to die: umm...who wants to do that?
last time in love: with jeff
last time hugged: yesterday
last time scolded: this morning for something...i dont know
last chair sat in: well right now the computer chair before that my car 
last lipstick used: don't like lipstick only chapstick and lip gloss!!  and it was either softlips or some lip gloss from B&BW
last shirt worn: right now...hall shirt...last time...chick-fil-a uniform
last time dancing: with kyle 
last poster looked at: alishas ABC poster in our dorm

AGOS~
1 MINUTE AGO: doing this
1 HOUR AGO: running errands
1 DAY AGO: at work (both of them)
1 WEEK AGO: sleeping
1 YEAR AGO: with jeff at his grandparents

QUESTIONS~
1. What do you most like about your body? my hair
2. And least? my stomach
3. How many fillings do you have? none
4. Do you think you're good looking? i think i'm starting too a little
5. Do other people tell you that you're good looking? yeah i guess

FIRSTS~
First job:  mutt's BBQ...yuck...don't ever eat there (bad man!)
First screen name: bumbles63426
First funeral: mark burrells, alishas grandmothers, and then my dads
First pet: daisy aka wide load
First piercing/tattoo: none
First credit card: gap and old navy
First Kiss: bo when i was like 2
First one that mattered: jeff always
First love: jeff
First enemy: the neals
First big trip: disney world when i was 4
First concert: n'sync at the bi-lo center
First musician you remember hearing in your house: some 8-track dad had playing in the garage i'm sure

ok so you didn't have to make ME cry.  that's sad buddy, i didn't mean to make you feel like that.  i seriously was just exhausted.  i mean i went to bed as soon as i got home (of course after i ate).  but still i wasn't lying or anything to you about what i was doing.  i know you're disappointed in me for "not wanting" to see you.  buddy i really did want to spend time with you, i miss you.  the other night, painting, was soooo fun!!  i wish i hadn't had an exam the next morning or i would have stayed longer.  this is only my first week out of school let me get adjusted and i promise we'll be spending more time together.  maybe we can go to breakfast or dinner this week or whenever we both have time.  deal?  i love you and you know that and i would never want to do anything that would hurt our friendship i value it too much.  have fun tonight getting coffee with me...*wink wink*.  lol.  call me tomorrow or tonight (cell it).

new subject (sorry to be so abrupt):

ok so i went to the movies the other night totally awesome.  i had so much fun.  we went and saw ocean's 12 it was great just don't go to the movie thinking it's going to be better than the first b/c duh that's the rule!  but i enjoyed myself and the movie.  and oh yes he's soooo H-O-T...HOT!

ok so...lol you like how i start every paragraph with "ok so"...anywho, the whole jeff thing is still interesting i haven't really thought about any of it.  i'm just happy where i am and i don't really want to change that right now so there it is my life in a nut shell...NOTHING!...lol.  ok well i'm off, bunches, megs

ok so this week has been totally awesome!!  of course it has had it's down falls but what doesn't??  anywho, so me and jeff are kinda i don't know, i guess we're dating...we always were and now his finally come around.  the jeff that i've known the past year has been a complete jerk, but it's like a ton of bricks just hit the boy in his head.  his just the jeff i fell in love with 4 years ago!!  it's awesome!  he calls me just to say "i love you" and he wants to do all the little things he used to do.  which he knows means the world to me.  i just love it!!  i think we're going to be getting really serious in the next year or two and i'm glad that's it's going to be like this.  his the greatest guy and he's had his troubles and i've had mine and he was always there for me and always has been.  even though he may of had something that i knew was more important than me, but he didn't think so.  that's what i love...he puts me first (my jeff anyways, not the one that's been around lately), but he doesn't show any signs of going back to his old ways so i'm happy now it's finally how it's supposes to be.  bunches of love, megs

ok first of all i only hit the cancel button once and that's b/c i was standing in the middle of a store talking to someone and the other times yes i didn't want to talk to you b/c i was with jeff, but that's not the only reason.  you've pissed me off and jeff pisses you off and jeff gets pissed off at you and me when i do answer the phone so it's just easier to not answer.  and why do you decide to call me when i'm with jeff you haven't called me like that in forever so what makes tonight so special??  and don't give me that crap about you not answering when you're with david b/c when you do answer all i get is "let me call you back" or i just hear you talking to him and you lie to me over the phone about what you're doing.  buddy we're both in the wrong and we keep giving each other this load of crap about everything.  you're gay, i'm not okay with it (b/c you say stuff about "us"), and we know it's never going to work out b/c neither one of us give it the effort so why not just say what needs to be said.  we're best friends and that's it.  and no this isn't coming on b/c of all the jeff or kyle stuff...i've been thinking about it for a while and i've gotten a lot of signs about it and i've prayed about it and this is it.  i'm happy, you're happy, but we're just not happy with one another right now b/c we're both pissed and we shouldn't be.  we're just acting jealous and it's beginning to become ridiculous.  so i love you buddy and i hope you're not mad b/c i'm not, i'm fine (i'm trying to help the situation since you think i'm not doing a good job of that) and let's just move on....

so how was your day?  have you talked to doug today?  i really wanna know what's going on there...you obviously seem to have something why don't you talk to him about it?  and how's your new job going, i've been meaning to ask you?  i miss you buddy let's go christmas shopping!!  i only have 7 days of classes and exams left...yay!!  i really want to  tell you i'm happy for you buddy and i'm glad you're the person you are.  i think you're awesome!!  (and i'm not trying to kiss up, i mean it) you rock my world!!  don't be mad it's okay!!  have a great night!!  love you!!  megs

well christofur i think is trying to apologize for this week.  he sent me a text message and said something confusing like he always does...just these random facts of information.  buddy i don't know what you're talking about in the text message so i guess i'm choosing to pretend like i don't know...b/c i really don't.  lol.  anywho, 

everyone at chick-fil-a thinks that me and kyle have this big undercover thing going on.  UMMMMM NO we don't!!!  we just like hanging out with each other.  so i wish people would just stop!!

still havent talked to jeff...lol.

well i have to go study for yes another huge butt test...this time it's in biology.  i really need to do good on this one.  i just printed off a bunch of notes so maybe i'll do good.  ok well bye!  bunches, megs

WOW!!!!  so this week has been sooooo interesting.  i bought a car, it's so pretty!!  it's a black 2001 hyundai santa fe.  it's loaded!!  leather interior, cd player, cruise control, split shift, and omg it's just great!!  i love it!!  his name is sebastian.  poor poor shawneequa i still love her she's sitting in the driveway...big shout out to her!!  

chris is starting to irritate me a little.  it's like he knows what buttons to push and pushes them anyways.  this entire past week i've been just shoved to the side.  i'm on the back burner has he once called it when i did this exact same thing to him.  it really just bothers me when people tell you they're going to do something and don't follow through...it's just annoying.  

it's okay to be who you want to be just don't get too many situations as i have going on.  but then again i have everything figured out.  it's difficult not knowing what to do and i pray for you every night buddy...i know that sounds kind of weird but i seriously do.  i only want the best for you.  i know where you end up *wink* i just hope you figure it out.  

kyle's been absolutely amazing!!  we talked for hours tonight!!  he so great.  he is just so down to earth, very intelligent, and simply hilarious.  he's everything i've ever wanted in a guy.  i feel myself holding back for some reason and i don't want too.  i just wanna be like kyle you're just awesome.  he makes these remarks that just make a girl think and uuggghhhh he's just grand!  

still haven't talked to jeff in forever!!  i was supposes to see him monday night, but like i said earlier i don't like it when people say they're going to do something and don't do it...anywho he was supposes to call chick-fil-a at 9 and did he?  NO!!  so needless to say i left when i got off work and i don't know what he's been doing.  it's so difficult b/c i love him i just don't think i'm IN love with him any more.  

love is a word that just seems to be thrown around too easily now and days.  i want to be so in love with someone that it doesn't matter how much money or material things we have.  as long as we have one another i'm happy.  i don't care about all that other stuff.  i just want to be happy in what i do have in life that i worked for to make a success.  

i don't want to wish my life away, but i just wish that i could get on with it.  i want to fast forward 5 years and know who i'm going to marry and have my career and start a family.  i simply want to be settled and be in a stable part of my life.  it feels like it's taking forever to get to that point.  

okay well i have a huge butt spanish test to study for and yes it's 12:14 AM!!  and the class is at...yes 9:30 AM!!  i'm screwed.  oh well.  at least it's almost friday!  bunches of love, megs

P.S.:  i really hate just talking about boys in my journals, but it seems to be the main issue, i'll try to stay away from the whole boy topic next time!!...lol.

ok so you stand me up and expect me to call you...i'm so mad.  and the weirdest thing just happened...i get online and all of a sudden the song "true" comes on my computer and i haven't hit anything to play that song.  if that's not something i don't know what is.  you keep playing these little games and all the while you're pushing me away.  it's your decision i give up now.  i've tried and it seems like you're not paying me any attention.  

haven't talked to jeff in a week.  it's strange but i'm getting used to it.  (ya know not being with him).  i kinda feel weird in a good and bad way both.  i don't know.  it's just complicated.  

saw kyle tonight, his as hot as ever.  i really wish he would just ask for my number i'm too chicken to give it to him.  oh well we'll see tomorrow night.

and you know i'm just saying all this to make you mad.  but i really am mad at you so don't plan on me talking to you for at least the next 4 days.  

bunches, megs

P.S.:  ignore the last current music, it doesn't apply anymore.

well i'm balling my eyes out right now over the stupidest thing in the entire world.  ok so in chapel they have like 6 people who stand at the columns and take down names of people who sleep, talk, or aren't paying attention during the service don't get their chapel credit whether they come or not.  well the guy that stands on my column takes down at least 10 names every chapel service and i guess he decided he was going to take mine down.  so i go check my mail--yeah there's some papers, mail, and a letter saying i didn't get chapel credit for monday november the 8th b/c i was either sleeping, talking, or not paying attention.  well that's b.s.!!!  b/c i know i paid attention and i couldn't of been sleeping if i was paying attention b/c the entire service was on BSU's missionaries that went overseas this summer.  and i find all of that really interesting so i enjoyed the service very much more than any of the others.  but NO! i wasn't paying attention b/c some butthole thinks he has to take down names so that he can keep being the dork that stands up during chapel writing down names so that people like me can hate him.  and don't think i won't say something to him tomorrow in spanish b/c yes he is in there.  and now i have to make an appointment with the director of chapel to explain to him why i deserve my chapel credit.  i have enough stress on me to last a life time and now i have to put up with this mess.  not to mention that george is here and that always makes things 100 times worse.  and school, boys, and work all have me upset and really stressed out.  well i'm done now...and i'm hungry so i'll talk to you guys later.  bunches, megs

it's hard not being able to fall in love with someone b/c you know you just can't.  it's like it's always there but nothing can ever be done.  gggeeeezzz...why does life have to be soooo difficult all of the time.  when you know you trust, adore, have great memories with, talk easily to them, and know that there's something there, it's just frustrating to know..."sorry, ain't going to happen".  everything would just be so much easier...everything else could just go away and bam! everythings great from there on out.  just what if it happened?

ok on a lighter note...i'm getting a car hopefully.  christofur is too.  we're still in the process of looking first, but eventually we'll get the point where it's time for a "road trip!!"  

i took a history test today...yeah i think i did ok...i needed to do great b/c i got a big 49 on the last one and i needed a 100 on this one to even out my scores b/c we only take two tests in there the whole year...so i'm a little worried.

finally i got the internet today!!  downloaded all necessary items and i'm set to go.  

anywho i'm getting tired b/c i was looking at cars before i decided to write this, plus i've stayed up until 4 am for the last 2 nights...so i have a good excuse to be extremely tired.  talk to you guys later.  bunches of love, megs

so me and christofur and a blast tonight!  we haven't had that much fun since grecthen...lol. won't share what went on tonight...chris might hurt me...but it was funny! 

well things have been a little stressful this week.  got a job at bath and body works!!  yah for me!  had a butt load of tests this week not including all of those dang papers i had to write.  i'm in the middle of writing one right now...but as you can see i'm not too into it right now.  i really don't have much to say.  i'm just tired and i'm tired of writing this paper and chris just signed off on me.  i was in the middle of saying good bye and BAM! he signs off.  way to go bud.  te quiero?  really do i look like a D.A. (da)...lol.  don't answer that.  i don't really know what you meant by it you might have been talking about that spanish movie...really i don't know...lol.  anywho, i have to go write this paper and i still have to study for biology.  bunches of love, megs

ok so i was with jeff last night and of course he's his usual 2 and a half hours late.  we go eat at...yes... 10 pm...i'm starving and pissed off.  so we eat and i wasn't really making eye contact with him much.  i really didn't even want to be there.  then we went and looked at the santa fe that i'm buying tomorrow!!!  i hope.  and of course he had negative things to say about it...which pissed me off even more.  and the whole night he had the audacidy to tell me "girlfriend...please?" i was just thinking "not if my life depended on it".  the whole night i just thought about one person and think it's time we move to the next level.  or am i just stupid?  i really don't know...i'm just going with my gut.  i'm really nervous b/c i've been thinking about it a lot lately and yes i think it's time...i'm bringing down the house with this one.  and yes...i'm very very nervous.  wish me luck!  bunches of love, megs

ok so the movie tonight...was scary as hell!!  kyle, of course, sat next to me and we had a blast (not like that).  he is so funny!!  i could tell he was nervous and he kept asking me if i was hot b/c he was and the temperature in the room was fine...so i think his emotions were getting to him a little bit.  and after we got back to chick-fil-a and got out of kyle's car, everyone was looking at me like "do something!" but i didn't b/c i'm a big chicken.  so i don't know how things are going to go...i guess we'll see.  

right now i'm going to go to bed b/c i'm hearing freaky noises and i'm getting really scared plus i have to be at work in less than 4 hours.  bunches of love, megs

to chris:
ok buddy so you're giving me this massive load of information in your journal and not to me but that's ok here's what i have to say about it...
i love you. (period) and i really don't know what to think, say, or do about it.  i always have and always will.  i don't know if it's more than a friend love or what, but it's definitly on my mind.  ok and so we're going straight now or are you still undecided?  i'm really confused can you tell.  but i do have everything figured out.  

to kyle:
life's full of chances and choices to make...i say take 'em and make 'em.  life's too short to be worrying about the past, just move on and go for whatever falls into your lap at the moment and if it doesn't work out...who really cares?  move on again.  i had fun staying after work tonight and i saw a different side to you...you were kind of nervous and it was cute.  and i'm really excited about tomorrow, going to the movies, it's going to be great!!

to jeff:
i don't really know what to think about our situation.  i mean i love you to death, we've been through so much and you've done so much for me.  i've learned a lot from you and it seems like we're meant to be, but maybe not meant to be right now.  you put me out in the field again and now i'm wanting to see new people and see what happens.  i'm sorry if this hurts you, but you put me through a lot in the past few months and now that i've gotten the "hang" of it, you up and decide you want me back.  it's not that easy.  just give me time and we'll see what comes our way.

to myself:
be strong, think fast on your feet, encourage others, and love...always love.  never let a day go by that you've regretted...live that day to it's full potential and strive to meet all of your goals.  and most of all good luck!

to chick-fil-a:
keep your mouths shut!!  everyone don't need to know.  (about everything, not just kyle.)  

to others:
(read "to myself")

ok guys well i guess it's time for me to go write my speech, since it's due tomorrow and i have to present it at 11 am.  wish me luck.  and good night.  bunches of love, megs

yeah so i HAVE figured everything out...at least i hope i have.  and don't give me that crap about you've had everything figured out since the beginning of the summer, if you have then you're struggling getting it across to other people about what it is.  and what's this about you saying you throw me off course??  i don't get it.  but i have got it all figured out and you will all see shortly...hopefully if it plays out right.  (HINT:  i've had a lot of new signs that i think are pointing me in the right direction, but we'll have to see?!?!?!?)

so i don't think i'm going to get to go on my date friday unless it's extreme late.  they scheduled us to work b/c too many other people asked off.  so i work till 9...kyle till 10...chris till 6...tramaine is off...and sarah i'm not sure about.  but we still have to work so it sucks. maybe there'll be a late showing of the movie.

haven't talked to jeff in a while, but he did call me briefly to ask me to come over...what did i say??  NO!!!  and then he wanted to go to my culture event with me, but i took christofur instead he seemed more interested.  

oh and school's going well except for the fat "F" i got in u.s. history, but i think i can bring it back up so i'm not too worried about it.

it's been two years since dad's passed away (last thursday) and mom took it rather better than expected so i'm extremely proud of her.  it's not getting easier, it's just she's taking it a little better with time.

sorry for being so jumpy in this journal with my many events, but you guys get it.

well it's time for me to head back to the hills, plus i need to go run so i'm going to do that too. 

P.S.  what's with the "read in to that more b/c it means so much on different levels and has different meanings"...don't get you sometimes buddy...but i still love you! 

bunches of love always, megs

ok so today at work was interesting...i had a few convos with the co-workers and they all seemed to be catching on to me liking kyle and kyle liking me.  jason told me he was going to get the dirt from kyle and find out what's really going through kyle's head.  i really don't want anything to be said about it at work but i know that's not going to happen.  i mean this is chick-fil-a we're talking about now.

yesterday me and chris went to the football game and guess who we saw...matt crain...ummm yes hot hot boy!!  got those digits and hopefully we'll be seeing each other real soon.  i think i made buddy mad though.  i didn't mean too.  i just assumed that nothing was happening any more b/c nothing else has been said.  i'm sorry if i made you mad or whatever you we're feeling since you never told me.  love you!!

but i'm extremely tired b/c chris kept me up until 5 a.m. this morning!!  and i so had to be at work at 11 until close!!  i dragged the whole day, but that's ok i got through it.  but i have to rest up for bowling tomorrow!!  night night.  bunches, megs

waiting is so frustrating....it just makes me wonder.  ya know?  it's like sometimes i don't know b/c of some actions or comments made by a certain person.  (you know who you are).  and it's just seems like the scale is balanced but it shouldn't be...one or the other way is the only way to go.  i just have this feeling and i don't really know how to describe it.  but it will fall into place if it's supposes too.  b/c i'm in no mood to rush things, i just don't want anything to be like last time...comprende?

so i'm really excited about my date next friday with the chick-fil-a crew.  we're going to see some scary movie.  and i'm kind of fond of this one guy and i hope things--do something.  and i wouldn't call this my rebound from jeff...b/c i hate calling it a rebound.  in order to get over someone you have to move on to someone else...and you never ever date anyone that you don't think you could see yourself marrying...right?  right.  

talk about signs...let me just tell you what just happened to me.  so i was on my way home from ngc and i got to thinking (funny ha ha)...lol.  anywho i was thinking about a lot of stuff at once like i normally do and i usually get ahead of myself that's why none of my journal entries ever make any sense...but i was thinking about updating my journal, my mission trip two years ago, olive juice :), and that the subject of the journal entry is key to everything...lol...i crack myself up.  but anywho the sign was that when i thought of olive juice i looked over and out of the corner of my eye i saw a sign that said olive branch on it.  i was like "wow" so is that a sign?  maybe not i don't know, but it just seemed weird that it happened at the moment i was thinking about it.  

but i have to go get ready now i'm going to the big homecoming football game tonight!!  what what!!  love you all, megs

I won't talk
I won't breathe
I won't move till you finally see
That you belong with me

You might think
I don't look
But deep inside in the corner of my mind
I'm attached to you

I'm weak
It's true
Cause I'm afraid to know the answer
Do you want me too?
Cause my heart keeps falling faster

I've waited all my life
To cross this line
To the only thing that's true
So I will not hide
It's time to try anything to be with you
All my life I've waited

This is true

You don't know
What you do
Everytime you walk into the room
I'm afraid to move

I'm weak
It's true
I'm just scared to know the ending
Do you see me too?
Do you even know you met me?

I've waited all my life
To cross this line
To the only thing that's true
So I will not hide
It's time to try, anything to be with you
All my life I've waited

This is true

I know when I go
I'll be on my way to you
The way that's true

I've waited all my life
To cross this line
To the only thing thats true
So I will not hide
It's time to try, anything to be with you
All my life I've waited

This is true


~~this is sooooo the most awesome song ever!!  it's definitely THE song.

so guys it's been a while.  well i actually don't remember how long ago since i last wrote in here but i'm doing it now!!  hee hee.  anywho, how are things going with you?  me...i'm great.  things are interesting as usual and i love it.  it's so fun being _______ (i don't even know a word for it).  but life's good and tiring...which i guess is a good thing.  

i've been trying to figure something out and i can't seem to put my finger on what to do about it.  it's so complicated...which i don't think it should be and i'm not really thinking too much on it, it's just weird.  (hint: cabrera)

inside joke~  saved!~  the girl (in the cinema) is trying to do something that i think someone was hinting at that i might be doing...but i'm not.  you can do whatever you want to buddy...it's your life and i have no say in it...i'm just the friend here to give the advice.  love you!

jeffro is being weird again.  love him to death don't know what i would do without him...but he just confuses me all the time.  i don't think it's very healthy, but it's amusing.  lol.  we're going to columbia tomorrow and that should over well...i hope.  it's been a while since we've been on a long road trip together so i don't know what to expect.  

well guys my last thought for today is a few quotes~  you must first put up the rain in order to see the rainbow  ~~  love is not to love a perfect person, but love is to love an imperfect person perfectly.

ok so it's finally fall break...but yes i have tons of homework including a take home test and i'm like "yuck".  anywho it's been fun so far, george got to visit me (not fun), had to work (sorta fun), and then i got to go to the movies with christofur!!  we went and saw "the forgotten" it was interesting to say the least.  today i went to work again 630-230 baby!  and found out that chris morrow wanted to go with me to fall for greenville..thanks to jason for not telling me i didn't get to go...*tear*...lol.  but i dont care i fun with my chris.  OH, and i went and saw jeff...don't really know what's happening there, his trying to act all sweet and cute again and i love that his doing that i just wish he would do that and be committed at the same time...ya know?  but now i'm 'bout to go pre-bowl with the "wow cows" and get a good score (hopefully) and go grocery shopping...yey!  "so i'll see you cats and kittens later!"  bucnhes of love, megs

ok so have you ever been so confused that you think something happened that didn't happen, but really did actually happen.  confused?  exactly.  i don't get it with this special someone who doesn't seem to even know his own name if someone didn't say it to him everyday.  i'm a little pissed and i don't really know why b/c i know that nothing could ever happen between me and this person b/c he has completely lost my respect due to his inconsiderate judgment calls.  and don't take this personal buddy...i'm not really mad i guess i'm just venting.  so don't get mad at me and not talk to me for five months...lol!!  i'm not mad at you...i just understand and i'm expressing my opinion.  but i love you sooo much, but you just seem to not know what's going on in your own life, yet you seem to know how to make all of the right choices in life, but you turn and run away from them.  i don't understand and i guess i never will b/c you never gave it the chance.  i love you and i hope you understand that and just don't be mad at me b/c i don't think i could really bare that right now and neither can you.  so be happy and live your life the way you want too.  bunches of love forever, megan

this past week has been SOOOO interesting...lots is going on and i dont really know what to think of it all.  i feel like 2003 is starting all over again...and i really dont want that to happen (the bad stuff).  its just i wish i knew the words of what to say and what to do...or even know how things work out later on in life.  what exactly am i to make of the situations that are happening all around me.  i just think i want things to happen and not worry and think on them so much so i think i'm just going to let it be see what awaits me!!

Quote of the Day:  "Your reactions are based on your decisions, so what's your decision going to be that causes your reaction."

well i'm off to good ole chick-fil-a from 2-8 p.m. come see me!!  bunches of love, megs

ok so i'm starting to get very aggravated with the computer lab nerds!!  b/c i want to have the internet on MY computer and not have to keep going into other people's rooms and using their's.  

i'm also feeling a little stressed with the whole jeff situation...when am i not?  but i haven't talked to him since sunday and i really don't want to...it's just seems weird i guess.

i joined a bowling team...we're called the wow cows!!  (it's with chick-fil-a) and it's me, sarah v., and bobby.  we all have a grand ole time and it's just hilarious.  i got a turkey (three strikes in a row) on my first game, but that didn't really help us any b/c we were playing for our handicap so actually we needed to bowl as low as possible...which didn't help us at all....

ok well i have to go and study BIG test tomorrow!!  bunches of love, megs

ok so i wake up this morning to a phone call....can you imagine who it could be?....it was jeff.  i was completely taken off guard b/c you know it isn't supposes to call me unless he wants to be getting back together.  wrong.  he just wanted to talk to me b/c he misses and for me having to be all "mean" to him about not calling was really difficult.  i mean wouldn't you stand your ground too?  and then he wanted to see me.  well i meet him at ingles and told him i had to run some errands and if he wanted to come along he could.  so of course he did b/c he has got it bad for "the megan."  and it was fun, yah know?  we hung out cut up laughed had a few kisses here and there and it was great.  but i told him there couldn't be anymore of this b/c we weren't together and this is not burger king (you can't have it your way).  so we'll see how long it lasts.  it only took him 6 days to miss me enough to call.  i bet jason that it would be less than a week before he called...sure enough.  bunches of love, megs

so i went out to eat tonight and chris got behing me (driving) for like the third time today...anywho, not the point...i rode by "the village" where jeff is ALWAYS hanging out and he wasn't there for like the first time ever.  i think he might actually be trying to stop going to those places b/c mom told me he called the day after we had our huge fight and decided not to talk anymore...and was looking for me.  of course mom forgets and doesn't relay the message.  but i can't return his phone call now it'll look silly and stupid of me.  so i think i'm just going to wait and see what he does.  i miss him sooooooooo very very much!!!!  it's so hard to not be able to talk to your best friend and chris don't take any offense to that b/c you know you're my best "guy" friend (lol), but jeff is my best relationship best friend...you understand right?  good.  

i'm just ready for all of this crap to be over with and i can start to have somewhat of a normal life like everyone else....i'm so sick of drama!!  peace out home dogs, megs

well i told jeff that i never wanted to talk to him again and i'm so upset about it b/c he's the love of my life!  i told him that i could settle for 2nd best b/c he was definitely the one!  it was about a 3 hours conversation that took place that i cried probably 2 hours and 59 minutes through.  i miss him so much i just want to call him and say i love you...one more time just so i can hear him and know he's there.  i told him to call me when he got ready to get back together which i'm thinking so going to be a lifetime!  but he assured me that it's not going to be a long time.  he said no more that a year tops.  which makes me sad b/c i don't want to be away from him for a year...it's already been 3 months!  but i'm at peace about it b/c i know everything will work it's way out.  

well me and candace went to wal-mart and ingles from ngc...all in an hour and a half....impressive....no?  lol...anywho, yeah and i saw jeff's truck at the village like always...it made me miss him even more than i already was at that moment.  

christofur isn't talking to me about much right now...he says he has something to say but he won't tell me what it is...and he still has my cds!!  i'm 'bout to come after you boy!  lol...well i'm a little upset right now after my spill so i think i'm going to get in the bed...night guys!  bunches of love, megs

it's been a while!!!  i've been at school and i don't have the internet yet b/c they want my to pay them $95 so that they can give me a password to be able to spy on me....i don't think so!!  anywho i pitched a fit about it and now i don't have to pay for it so i will be getting the internet as soon as they get done with my computer!  well me and jeff are starting to talk more and i think we're trying to get back into that stage of committing to one another again.  he did the sweetest thing the other day (by accident though...oh you'll see why) he called me and i we we're talking about music and he said "well there's this song i want you to hear and i want to dedicate it to you"  i said "ok what it is...country, alternative, or what?" he said "i don't know i'll have to find out" and then he was like "MEGAN!!" (scared me to death!) and i said "what...good lord!" and he said "start that song over" (b/c i was listening to one of my new cd's) and it was the song he wanted me to hear!!  (awwwwww!!!) so i thought it was the sweetest thing...so i've been talking about it a lot sorry guys!  but he hasn't done something like that for me in a long time so i am excited!  

my new buddy candace has live journal as well!!  isn't that fun?  so i have to go read hers in a minute!

i've been working like a dog the past two weeks...i've worked a total of 55 hours! i have never worked so much in my whole life!!  but a fat paycheck is coming!

christofur the journal entries....really? is that necessary?  i have no clue what you are talking about half the time i bet you don't even know what you're talking about.  and i'm about to kill you with the whole "no, yes, no, yes, no" thing...you know what it is don't play dumb!

ok guys well it's late (well not really i just slept for 3 hours and got up about an hour ago from that nap) but i'm still tired, but i hear mom watching "finding nemo" so i want to go watch it too!....love you all bunches, megs

well i haven't been able to write in my journal b/c we still don't have the internet or our computers back yet from school.  so here i am writing my journal in my car on my new laptop and i'm planning on saving it on the internet later.  so me and christofur went out last night for a whole 20 minutes and he acted so weird i don't know what is up with him.  he told me he was going to write in his journal and i doubt he did b/c i haven't had a chance to check it yet and he also told me that he was going to call me when he finished writing it which he didn't do that either, so i'm a little perturbed with him at the moment.  college life is awesome and i'm enjoying every minute of it!  i have to go to work tonight and then me and alisha are going to wash clothes and do our biology homework!  i miss jeff we haven't talked since our BIG talk about easing off one another.  i feel so much better about the situation.  we finally got a lot of things said that needed to be said.  okay so chris still has me wondering about what in the world was up with him last night...sorry about the sudden topic change.  i tried calling him today on his cell phone and it just keeps making the burping noise (i guess that's the best way to describe it) and i even tried calling his house phone and still nothing.  maybe you're at work, i'll be there shortly come and visit! well the line for picking up mason is moving so i can't drive and type at the same time so i have to go...peace!  megs

have you ever been so in love with someone that you think it's better for you to be apart?  i know it sounds weird, but in order for me to make mine and jeff's relationship stronger i think we need serious time apart.  i'm so in love with him and he just doesn't seem to care any more.  i know he does, it's just the way he has been acting that has gotten me down about the whole situation.  i wish he would just fall in love with me all over again and we could just start over.  i can't even begin to tell you how horrible it feels to be so deeply in love with someone and not being able to be with them.  megs

this week was my first week of school as a resident and it has been very fun!  i'm really excited about working on my major and being able to focus more on my career.  i'm about tired of the whole boy issues.  i had a deep conversation with brad kelley the other night and it got to think about a lot of stuff, like where i want to be in life, who i want to be with, and when i want all of that to happen.  anywho, i love our suit mates they are awesome their names are candace and eden.  chris came to see me at ngc the other night too!!  it was nice to see him b/c i hadn't seen in like a whole two days, but i do miss being 3 minutes away from you buddy!!  i want to go walking so maybe we can add that to our list of stuff to do while i'm at home!  well i have to go b/c chris is supposes to be here in like 46 minutes (i'm still counting) and we're going to do chores around mi casa.  bunches, megs

i went on a double date last night...it was fun, we grilled out and swam.  alisha and reo might be getting back together he wants to "talk" to her tonight.  my first day of school is tomorrow and i went and got all of my stuff done today and now i'm ready to get the show on the road!  it'll be my first night spending the night up at ngc tonight!  christofur's having drama like he always does, even though he denys it, you do buddy!!  it's about time you start finding yourself b/c you're a little behind!  you're almost out of your teens, hop to it!  well i have to go hop in the shower for revival tonight...peace out!  bunches of love, megs

so i think i'm starting to enjoy the single life, but it does suck b/c i would like to have someone to be there for me when i needed them.  anywho i have new boys in mind that are very cute and fun!!  i have my "antenna" out (as mom would say) and it's an interesting concept that i'm trying to get used to.  i'm still having weird feelings, but they're starting to fade i think.  i still don't know what they were..i wish i could figure it out...i have racked my brain trying to solve this one!!  it's just not working.  chris and i are going to church tomorrow, together..lol, i can just see the whole congregation now staring at us thinking "what the **** are they doing here"...lol.  it's going to be GRAND!!  well another fish died, a different one than the first two, but me and chris went and got replacement ones for the first two so i don't know what i'll do about this third one.  stupid fish just keep on dying, pretty soon i won't have any.  did any of that make any sense?...lol, sorry i'm a little giddy and wide awake.  well i guess i better go get in the bed and try to sleep so i can get up in the morning for good ole church.  peace out home dogs, megs

so i'm still feeling weird...i don't know what it is.  it's almost like it's always been there, but i'm just now noticing it.  does that sound crazy?  i feel dumb saying all that b/c i don't know what i'm talking about.  i wish something would happen or someone would say something that would trigger the feeling i'm having so i can figure out what it is.  things with me and jeff just aren't floating the way i would like for them to float.  it's so complicated and i wish i could just find love without the drama (as chris would say)...and just be me and have fun...ya know?  what's so wrong with wanting that in my life, just to have something easy in life for a change.  it's interesting how we go through life wondering and dreaming of what our lives are going to be like and they never end up like we plan.  just a random thought.  well i'm going to watch "under the tuscan sun" with mi madre...peace out!  megs  P.S. on top of all of this two of my fish died..doesn't that suck!

i moved into my dorm today!!  it looks so cute and everything's in it's place, and i'm even more excited to move myself in on monday!!  i have to go to work tomorrow from 3pm-close, which i don't ever do on a saturday i usually always work 6:30am-2:30pm.  i love those hours now i'm getting these crappy ones!!  anywho i went and bought fish today for our dorm to make it more homey.  i got 6 different kinds of fish, their names are:  penny, sunshine, harry, al, valentine, and molly.  they're so cute!!  well i gotta go christofur might be coming to get me to go to ingles yet again!!  bunches of love, megs

i'm starting to feel a little weird...i don't know why.  like it just hit me like 30 seconds ago.  i feel like somethings going on or happening, but i don't know yet.  it's hard to explain how i feel.  i feel like everything's changing, and i'm ready for a change.  i mean i am moving out, i don't have a steady boyfriend anymore, and i'm focusing more on my career now.  i think i'm ready to move on in my relationship life, it's just i hate the hassle of getting to know someone on a personal and intimate level all over again.  i put so much into mine and jeff's relationship for it work and now it seems odd.  i don't know i just feel different.  i don't know i need to think more on it...i'll get back to you on that one.  bunches of love, megs

i am so mad at you christopher...i spelled it right that's how you know i'm serious...lol...sorry i had to laugh.  first you lied to me about getting paid tomorrow, then you told the whole world about my love life, and lastly...this is over the top...you told me that you weren't high enough on my priorities?  where are you're priorities?  i'm so mad at you...and i wish you would talk to someone about what you're feeling, b/c you won't talk to me and i try to get it out of you.  so don't say that you don't have someone to talk too.  you never want to say anything i know when you have something on you're mind like tonight at ingles i told you "you're in an ill mood"  and you said "no" and then i said "well you're in a weird mood" and you said "yeah i am" and then that's when you're supposes to go "i'm in a weird mood BECAUSE..."  DUMB A**!  yeah you heard me or saw me...lol...i said it or typed it...lol.  you need to think more or whatever you said you needed to do and tell me what's going on b/c i'm confused.  anywho, on a totally different subject i'm in the mood to run or walk or whatever it is that we do when we decide to go down the dark streets of silver ridge!  lol!!  well i move into NGC tomorrow i'm really excited, but nervous and sad.  i might be moving back home at christmas depending on how everything goes.  well i'm tired i have to get up early to move in!!  bunches of love, megs

this week has just been THE blah-est week ever!  jeff's trying to do whatever it is that he does.  i told him yesterday that all he cares about is himself and he hung up on me, but a few hours later he called me to apologize.  so tonight we're doing something i don't know what, but it's something.  me and chris have been going walking in the neighborhood, it's been loads of fun!  we're trying to go everyday (sometimes that doesn't always work with us)...but what are you going do?!?!  anywho, we went to this lame butt "biker" party last night that just wasn't our scene.  we thought we were going to get shot, we stayed about 30 minutes and then we were out (take one good look at the past...turn...and we're out!  lol!)  so that's an update on what's been happening in my life!  have an awesome day...love ya!  megs

ok well today has been the most stressful day of all time!  i took my car to get a new headliner put in it and the people that put it in left my car in reverse with the key turned to the ON position!  my car had been left like that for an hour and a half!  by the time i got there to pick it up the battery was dead!  then i had to go to work where they're making a sophomore in high school a team leader.  everyone thinks it's this big joke b/c this kid isn't going to be able to handle everyone older than him not listening to him b/c he supposes to be in charge.  it's just funny and i think it's time for me to move on away from chick-fil-a and hello build-a-bear!  then as i was leaving chick-fil-a my battery was dead again so i was stranded there!  and on top of all that my family had to have a hissy today about my dad not being around, so i've been very emotional today and frustrated!  today sucked!  bunches of love, megs

ok so today has been very stress related!  my family is having a breakdown b/c my dad isn't around anymore and it really takes a toll on my family.  we are all just emotionally strained and it hurts.  everybody thinks they have it bad, but come live in my world for a few days and then we'll talk.  however, i know that someone else always has it worse than i do.  i'm tired of this whole thing with jeff and i'm ready to meet new friends at ngc!  it's just everything in my life,i'm just ready for some major changes.  sorry to be so blah!...megs

don't you every wonder why people write about mostly love in journals and/or diaries?  it just seems odd that it's the focus of your life, but it's really not.  love is something we cherish, but we take for granted.  when you talk to your friends is all you discuss are your love lives....NO! you share moments in time that have past in your life, not all of them are about love.  i guess i'm saying this b/c sometimes it just seems ridiculous....sorry i know none of this makes any sense what-so-ever, it doesn't even make sense to me anymore...but it was on my mind.  buh bye, megs

well not much has happened since yesterday...i went to work and then came home and talked to jeff on the phone which we haven't done in a long time (that is talking on phone late at night).  but we talked about random things...and it was fun being able to flirt with him...it sounds stupid but you miss that kind of thing when you're not together.  just as a reminder never take anything for granted.  bunches of love, megs

well i had a good ole time in orlando!!  except when you go on vacation you always have to come back home and i got to come back home to drama, drama, and more drama!  first, i got to deal with the fact that there's spray paint all over my car and when we tried to get it off it took the black paint off my car too!  so now i have to get it painted again!  i am currently taking donations of any amount just send them to the megan fund...thanks!  our goal is to reach $800!  anywho, and then i had to deal with the whole jeff drama!  i can't believe it's been a month since we've broken up and everyday gets harder and harder...i can't make him understand that i am so in love with him and that we've worked so hard to make it this far and now it seems pointless.  all i want is to be with him and for us to go forward in life, but right now we're making that impossible!  i hate not being with him...he makes me feel loved, beautiful, intelligent, and he just leaves me breathless.  i just don't know what i'll do without him if this doesn't blow over.  he thinks i want to be with other people and that i only care about myself...which isn't true.  i think it's just one of those moments where you say things you don't mean.  i'm just tired of everything going down hill in my life i'm ready to climb a hill again.  and hopefully everything is going to change in a few weeks b/c i leave for college and i'm really excited about that...wish me luck!  and christofur don't worry about everything b/c it all happens for a reason!...i love ya!  anywho, i'll talk to y'all soon...buh bye! bunches of love, megs

today i'm so excited b/c i'm leaving for orlando!  and it's my first plane ride ever!  i'm not nervous now but i'm sure i will be once i get on the plane.  at 2:25 pm today everyone have a megan moment and remember me b/c that's when the plane takes off!  thanks!  well i won't be able to write in my journal for a few days so i'll miss everybody!  christofur i still don't understand what you're not telling me, but you'll tell me later i'm sure!  anywho, it's been great but i got to run, places to go, people to see, and planes to catch!....love you bunches, megs

okay...well the past few days have been rather interesting.  yesterday me and christofur went to get my car washed and this girl was standing outside of the car wash with this butterfly mask on that covered most of her face and a black hoody and a black too-too.  we were a little freaked out at first b/c the girl just stood there looking at us with her mouth open for like 5 minutes.  it was hilarious!!  anywho...jeff came over and i have missed him but it just feels different, i can't decide if it's in a good way or not.  i'm just ready to get back to the way we were and start over.  we had so much fun last night...he helped me study for my spanish test and him trying to say the words for me was cute!  i love being able to wake him up in the morning b/c he's ticklish and i love hearing him giggle at me.  things are great and wouldn't mind things changing b/c i still do kind of have a bad luck streak going.  mom called and told me it's raining in florida so that's a bummer i want some sun!  well talk to you later and love ya bunches!...megs

today is going to be so boring...ya know why? b/c everyone's left for vacation and i'm just sitting here trying to decide if i want to go back to bed or not.  i've been up since about 7, packing and saying my goodbyes.  maybe me and jeff will get to do something today b/c i really miss him.  i miss being able to see him all the time and laughing and cuttin' up with him.  Last night we went to eat at the Clock and we decide to play football with a sugar packet and jeff went to kick the ball for a bonus point and it hit me right in the face!!  it was so funny!  these black guys were just a laughing at me!  anywho...i'm so bored that i got a new screen name so here it is....shawneequa7502..yes folks you heard it here first!  now don't go and spend all that valuable info. in one place...buh bye....megs

today i feel yuk!  i don't know why.  i kind of feel used and abused.  everyone seems to be in a good mood except for me.  i'm glad everyone's happy with their lives, but i think i deserve to have happiness in my life too.  it doesn't seem fair sometimes.  i've just been on an emotional roller coaster this week and all for nothing.  i am so excited about going on vacation, i just can't tell you how excited i am.  i'm ready to get away from drama and just relax.  anywho sorry for being so blah! today, but it's how i feel.  buh bye!.....p.s. CHRIS!!! i AM still really mad at you, you third wheel maker person!

soooo....this is my first journal entry!  how exciting!  my buddy, christofur, told me about this place.  BUT!!, i'm kinda mad at him right now (breathe!! and we're over it!...lol) anywho, he knows why (he says its b/c he cant push the clutch in but i think thats b.s. get over it buddy!)  j/k!  do whatever you want it's your life, i'm cool with it.  i just like to pick on you about it.  love ya! so we're going somewheres special tomorrow...im so excited!! see ya at 330!  well i gotta go b/c i have to go watch my movie that i borrowed!  see ya later, megs
